How to get to your Facebook data

Processing time: 1 to 2 hours

Facebook has some of the best tools on hand to explore your data. I strongly recommend you explore them yourself. Read more about it by following the link above.

NOTE: Download your data in JSON format if you plan to analayze it here. The media quality doesn't matter. Only message reporting works for now.
